message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business and personal life. As we've discussed, the market value of this product is $1500000. Considering our conversation, I'm willing to make a one-time offer of $1200000. This is a competitive price that still reflects the product's true value. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal. What do you think?
